Package com.bluegosling.result

A simple value type that can represent either the value of a successful operation or the cause of failure for an unsuccessful one.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Result.Visitor<T,E,R>
    A visitor of results, for implementing the visitor pattern (double-dispatch) with results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Result<T,E>
    The result of an operation, which can either represent a successful value or a cause of failure.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FailedResultException
    An exception used to wrap the error in a Result, for result objects whose cause of failure is not a sub-type of Throwable.

Package com.bluegosling.result Description

A simple value type that can represent either the value of a successful operation or the cause of failure for an unsuccessful one.
